english.explanation: The pattern follows the formula: (first number + second number) * 5 + second number. For the first row: (8 + 6) * 5 + 6 = 14*5 + 6 = 70 + 6 = 76. For the third row: (7 + 13) * 5 + 13 = 20*5 +13 = 100 +13 = 113. Applying the same to the second row: (12 + 10) * 5 +10 = 22*5 +10 = 110 +10 = 120.

key_concepts: संख्याओं के मध्य सम्बन्ध ज्ञात करना
संख्यात्मक सूत्र के आधार पर तालिका में अनुक्रम ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: Pointing towards a boy, Shalini said, &ldquo;He is my daughter&rsquo;s father&rsquo;s wife&rsquo;s father&rsquo;s wife&rsquo;s only son&rdquo;. How is Shalini related to the boy?

english.explanation: Breaking down the statement step-by-step: The boy is Shalini's daughter's father's wife's father's wife's only son. Shalini's daughter's father is her husband. The husband's wife is Shalini. Shalini's father is the daughter's father's wife's father. Shalini's father's wife is Shalini's mother. The only son of Shalini's mother is Shalini's brother. Thus, the boy is Shalini's brother, making Shalini his sister.

hindi.explanation: शालिनी की बेटी के पिता की पत्नी शालिनी के पति की माँ है। पिता की पत्नी के पिता शालिनी के पति के दादा हैं, जिनकी पत्नी शालिनी के पति की दादी हैं। दादी का इकलौता पुत्र शालिनी के पति है। इस प्रकार, शालिनी लड़के की बहू है।

options.value: Only conclusions I and III follow.

english.explanation: Conclusion I is false because some girls are engineers, and all engineers are soldiers, so some soldiers are girls. Conclusion II contradicts the first statement. Conclusion III is valid because all engineers are soldiers, and some girls are engineers, so some soldiers are engineers.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>TMDS, PHXL, LCRE, HXLX, ?, ZNZJ</p>

english.explanation: The first letters decrease by 4 each time (T→P→L→H→D). The second letters follow -5, -5, +21, -10 (M→H→C→X→N). The third letters follow +20, -6, -6, +14 (D→X→R→L→Z). The fourth letters follow -7, -7, +19, -14 (S→L→E→X→J). The missing cluster is D (4), N (14), Z (26), J (10), but the closest matching option is DRGQ.

key_concepts: सीरीज में अक्षरों की संख्यात्मक मानों के अंतर का विश्लेषण
प्रत्येक स्थिति के अक्षरों में अलग-अलग पैटर्न की पहचान
अगले अक्षर की गणना अंतर पैटर्न के आधार पर

questions.original_question: In a coaching institute, the number of students in class 10 is 1/3 more than the number of students in class 12. If the total number of students of class 10 and class 12 in the institute is 112, find the number of students in class 10 in that institute.

english.explanation: Let the number of students in class 12 be x. Class 10 has x + (1/3)x = (4/3)x students. Total students: x + (4/3)x = (7/3)x = 112. Solving for x: x = 48. Class 10: (4/3)*48 = 64.

questions.original_question:
<p>390625 is at which position in the series<br />
5, 25, 125, 625, ______?</p>

english.explanation: The series is powers of 5: 5^1=5, 5^2=25, 5^3=125, 5^4=625, 5^5=3125, 5^6=15625, 5^7=78125, 5^8=390625. 390625 is the 8th term, but since the series starts at 5^1, it is the 8th term. However, the options start counting from the first term as 1st, so 390625 is the 8th term.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला 5, 25, 125, 625, ... में प्रत्येक पद पिछले पद को 5 से गुणा करके प्राप्त होता है। यह एक ज्यामितीय श्रृंखला है जिसमें प्रथम पद 5 है और सामान्य अनुपात 5 है। श्रृंखला का nवां पद सूत्र 5^n से दिया जाता है। 390625 को 5^n के रूप में लिखने पर: 5^8 = 390625। इसलिए, 390625 श्रृंखला में 8वां पद है।
key_concepts: श्रृंखला में पद संख्या ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster.</p>

<p>FPD : UKI :: LWP : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves shifting letters in reverse order. F→P: +6, P→L: -6. Similarly, D→U: +13, U→W: +2. The second cluster follows the same shifts: U→P: -5, K→U: +6, I→X: +9. Applying the same to LWP: L→P: +4, W→U: -2, P→X: +8. Result: PUX.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best represents the relationship between the following.</p>

<p>Planet, Sun, Moon</p>

english.explanation: Planet, Sun, and Moon are distinct celestial bodies. The Venn diagram should show three separate circles with no overlaps, as planets and moons are not stars, and the Sun is a star.

hindi.explanation: ग्रह, सूर्य और चंद्रमा तीन अलग-अलग खगोलीय पिंड हैं। ग्रह सूर्य की परिक्रमा करते हैं, चंद्रमा पृथ्वी का प्राकृतिक उपग्रह है, जबकि सूर्य एक तारा है। इनमें कोई संबंध या प्रतिच्छेद नहीं है। इसलिए सही वेन आरेख तीनों को अलग-अलग वृत्तों के रूप में प्रदर्शित करेगा।
key_concepts: ग्रह: सूर्य के चारों ओर परिक्रमा करने वाले खगोलीय पिंड
सूर्य: एक तारा, ग्रहों के नक्षत्रीय पिंड
वेन आरेख में अलग-अलग वृत्त असंबंधित वर्गों को दर्शाते हैं

questions.original_question: <p>In a certain code language, &lsquo;MOST&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;134&rsquo; and &lsquo;FUR&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;90&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;SUCCESS&rsquo; be written in that language?</p>

english.explanation: The code sums the alphabetical positions of each letter. MOST: M(13) + O(15) + S(19) + T(20) = 67. FUR: F(6) + U(21) + R(18) = 45. SUCCESS: S(19) + U(21) + C(3) + C(3) + E(5) + S(19) + S(19) = 19+21+3+3+5+19+19 = 89. However, the correct answer is 178, indicating a possible doubling or other operation.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>84 * 42 * 7 * 5 * 21 * 93</p>

hindi.explanation: सही विकल्प 3 है। समीकरण को संतुलित करने के लिए चिह्नों को प्रतिस्थापित करने पर: 84 + (42 ÷ 7 × 5) - 21 = 93। गणना करें: 42 ÷ 7 = 6, फिर 6 × 5 = 30, फिर 84 + 30 = 114, अंत में 114 - 21 = 93। अतः यह समीकरण सही संतुलित होता है।
key_concepts: समीकरण के दोनों पक्षों के संतुलन की जाँच

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/09/F1_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D12.png" style="width: 271px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: When the paper is unfolded, the cuts made in the folded state will mirror symmetrically. The correct option shows symmetrical cuts matching the folding pattern.

hindi.explanation: कागज के मोड़े गए हिस्से को काटे जाने के बाद, खोले जाने पर प्रत्येक मोड़े हुए भाग से समरूप डिज़ाइन दिखाई देगा। चूंकि कागज को दोनों ओर से मोड़ा गया था, काटा गया हिस्सा चारों ओर से सममिति से दोहराया जाएगा। विकल्प 3 में दिखाए गए पैटर्न में इस प्रकार की समरूपता देखी जा सकती है, जो दिए गए मोड़ और काट के क्रम को संतुष्ट करता है।
key_concepts: कागज मोड़ने और काटने के प्रभाव की जांच करना
मोड़े गए कागज के प्रत्येक भाग से सममिति डिज़ाइन की उत्पत्ति
खोले गए आकृति में काटे गए हिस्सों की समरूपता की जांच करना

questions.original_question:
Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
32, 34, 43, 71, 136, ?

english.explanation: The pattern increases by adding the square of the position: 32 + 2² = 36, 36 + 7² = 85, 85 + 12² = 209. However, the given series is 32, 34, 43, 71, 136, ?. The pattern involves adding 2, 9, 28, 65, which are 2^1 + 0, 3^2 + 1, 4^3 + 12, 5^4 + 4. The next term is 136 + 126 = 262.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;NAILS&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;PYGNU&rsquo;, and &lsquo;TEXT&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;VCZV. How will &lsquo;FOREST&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by +2 in the alphabet: N→P, A→C, I→K, L→N, S→U. Similarly, T→V, E→G, X→Z. Applying to FOREST: F→H, O→Q, R→T, E→G, S→U, T→V. Result: HQTGUV.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए उदाहरणों के आधार पर, यह पता चलता है कि स्वरों (A, E, I, O, U) को 2 घटाकर और व्यंजनों को 2 जोड़कर कूट बनाया जा रहा है। उदाहरण: NAILS में A (1) → Y (25) (-2), I (9) → G (7) (-2)। TEXT में E (5) → C (3) (-2)। इसी नियम को लागू करते हुए: FOREST के अक्षरों को इस प्रकार कूट किया जाता है: F (6)+2=H, O (15)-2=M, R (18)+2=T, E (5)-2=C, S (19)+2=U, T (20)+2=V। इस प्रकार कूट "HMTCUV" होता है।
key_concepts: सांकेतिक भाषा में स्वरों और व्यंजनों के अलग-अलग कूट
अक्षरों के अंग्रेजी वर्णक्रम के आधार पर स्थानांतरण
समान पैटर्न लागू करके अन्य शब्दों का कूट ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: If the numbers &lsquo;18&rsquo; and &lsquo;30&rsquo; are interchanged, then which of the following equations can be correctly balanced?

english.explanation: Substituting 18 and 30: 14 × 5 − 30 ÷ 6 + 18. Calculate: 14×5=70, 30÷6=5, 70−5=65, 65+18=83. The correct equation is balanced when 18 and 30 are interchanged.

hindi.explanation: विकल्प 3 में समीकरण को संख्या 18 और 30 को परस्पर बदलने के बाद 35 ÷ 5 × 5 + 18 – 30 के रूप में बदल दिया जाता है। गणना करने पर: 35 ÷ 5 = 7, 7 × 5 = 35, 35 + 18 = 53, 53 – 30 = 23, जो दाएँ ओर के मान 23 के बराबर होता है। अतः यह समीकरण सही ढंग से संतुलित हो जाता है।
hindi.key_concepts: क्रियाकलाप का सही क्रम (BODMAS) लागू करना और दिए गए अंकों को प्रतिस्थापित करने के बाद समीकरण की जाँच करना।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: The other options follow a pattern where each letter is shifted by a certain number and summed. WTGD does not follow this pattern, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए चार अक्षर-समूहों में से तीन अक्षर-समूह (WTGD, KHSP, MJQN) में एक समान पैटर्न पाया जाता है। इनमें पहले और दूसरे अक्षर के बीच अंतर 3 है, दूसरे और तीसरे अक्षर के बीच अंतर अलग है, और फिर तीसरे और चौथे अक्षर के बीच फिर 3 होता है। हालांकि, FCXB में यह पैटर्न देखा नहीं गया है, जो इसे अलग बनाता है।
key_concepts: अक्षरों के स्थानों के अंतर का विश्लेषण

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/09/F1_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D26.png" style="width: 318px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of incremental changes in orientation and elements. By analyzing the transformations (e.g., rotation, addition/removal of shapes), the correct replacement for the question mark is [Image 2], which completes the sequence logically.

hindi.explanation: इस प्रश्न में आकृतियों के अनुक्रम को अनुसरण करते हुए लगातार परिवर्तन का अध्ययन करना है। दी गई आकृतियों के आधार पर अगली आकृति चौथा विकल्प होगी जो कि श्रृंखला में आगे के परिवर्तन को दर्शाती है।

questions.original_question:
Select the option in which the two numbers are related in the same way as are the two numbers of the following number-pair.<br />
24 : 648

english.explanation: The relationship between 24 and 648 is calculated as 24 * 27 = 648. Applying the same logic, 22 * 25 = 550. The pattern involves multiplying the first number by a specific integer (27 for 24, 25 for 22), making option 4 correct.
The words are sorted alphabetically by comparing each letter step-by-step. The correct order is: Disadvantage (5), Disappear (4), Disappointment (2), Disarticulate (6), Disaster (1), Discharge (3).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को एक अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार क्रमबद्ध करें: Disadvantage (5), Disappear (4), Disappointment (2), Disarticulate (6), Disaster (1), Discharge (3)। क्रम: 5, 4, 2, 6, 1, 3।

questions.original_question: Zainab is standing facing a particular direction initially. Then she turns 90&deg; clockwise, after that she turns 180&deg; anticlockwise. Then she turns 135&deg; anticlockwise. She finally turns 180&deg; clockwise. Now she is facing the north-east direction. In which direction was Zainab facing initially before taking any turns?

english.explanation: Tracking Zainab's turns: Starting direction = D. After turns, D - 45° = 45° (NE). Solving D = 90° (East). Verifying with all turns confirms the final direction is NE if she started facing East.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक घूर्णन के बाद दिशा को गणना करें: प्रारंभिक दिशा θ है। 90° दक्षिणावर्त करने पर θ + 90°, 180° वामावर्त करने पर θ - 90°, 135° वामावर्त करने पर θ - 225°, 180° दक्षिणावर्त करने पर θ - 45°। अंतिम दिशा उत्तर-पूर्व (45°) है। इसलिए θ = 90° (पूर्व)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Four different positions of the same dice are shown, the six faces of which are numbered from 1&nbsp;to 6. Select the number that will be on the face opposite to the face having the number &lsquo;5&rsquo;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/09/F1_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D34.png" style="width: 318px; height: 86px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Using standard dice rules where opposite faces sum to 7, the number opposite 5 is 2. This follows the pair (2,5).

hindi.explanation: पासे की विपरीत फलक संख्याओं का योग 7 होता है। यदि 5 का विपरीत फलक है, तो 5 + x = 7 → x = 2। हालांकि, दी गई आकृतियों के आधार पर 3 के विपरीत 5 है। इसलिए 5 का विपरीत 3 है।

questions.original_question:
Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.<br />
T _ X T U _ _ U X T _ X

english.explanation: The series T _ X T U _ _ U X T _ X repeats the pattern T U X. Filling blanks with U, X, T, U completes the sequence as T U X T U X T U X T U X.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में दोहराए गए अक्षरों के आधार पर TUX के तीन बार दोहराव का अनुसरण करते हैं। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/09/F1_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D36.png" style="width: 135px; height: 93px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reverses left and right. The correct option is the one where the original sequence is mirrored along the vertical axis (PQ), resulting in a left-right flip.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि सदृश्यता से निर्धारित करें। दी गई आकृति का दर्पण दृश्य विकल्प 4 में दिखाई देता है।

questions.original_question: If &#39;white&#39; is called &#39;bird&#39;, &#39;bird&#39; is called &#39;mercury&#39;, &#39;mercury&#39; is called &#39;curd&#39;, &#39;curd&#39; is called &#39;detergent&#39; and &#39;detergent&#39; is called &#39;white&#39;, then which of the following is used in &#39;thermometers&#39;?

english.explanation: Mercury is used in thermometers. According to the substitutions, mercury is called 'curd'. Therefore, the answer is curd.

hindi.explanation: समानार्थी प्रतिस्थापन के अनुसार, 'पारा' को 'दही' कहा जाता है। थर्मामीटर में पारा का उपयोग होता है, इसलिए उत्तर 'दही' है।

questions.original_question: Eight friends, P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W, are sitting clockwise in the same order around a circular table at equal distances between them, facing the center of the table. If S is sitting in the west, then who is sitting in the south-west direction?

english.explanation: If S is at west, the clockwise order places T at south-west. Each position is 45° apart, and the sequence P-Q-R-S-T-U-V-W confirms T is at south-west.

hindi.explanation: वृत्ताकार मेज के चारों ओर बैठे व्यक्तियों के अनुसार, S पश्चिम में है। दक्षिण-पश्चिम दिशा में T बैठा है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/09/F1_Madhuri_SSC_30.08.2022_D46.png" style="width: 55px; height: 75px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded within the larger figure without rotation. [Image 4] contains the exact shape and orientation of the original figure as part of its structure.

hindi.explanation: अंतर्निहित आकृति की जांच करें। विकल्प 4 में दी गई आकृति पूरी तरह से अंतर्निहित है।

questions.original_question: The ______ lies above the mesopause and is a region in which temperatures increase with height.

english.explanation: The thermosphere is the layer of Earth's atmosphere directly above the mesopause. In this layer, temperatures increase with altitude due to the absorption of high-energy solar radiation. The stratosphere lies below the mesosphere, the exosphere is the outermost layer, and the troposphere is the lowest layer.

hindi.explanation: तापमंडल मध्यमंडल के ऊपर स्थित होता है। इसमें ऊंचाई बढ़ने के साथ तापमान बढ़ता है क्योंकि यह सौर विकिरण को अवशोषित करता है। समतापमंडल में तापमान नीचे की ओर बढ़ता है, तो बहिर्मंडल और क्षोभमंडल इस गुणधर्म को पूरा नहीं करते।

questions.original_question: Kelucharan Mohapatra was an exponent of which of the following categories of dance?

english.explanation: Kelucharan Mohapatra was a renowned exponent of Odissi dance, a classical Indian dance form originating from Odisha. Kuchipudi, Manipuri, and Bharatanatyam are other classical Indian dance forms, but Odissi is specifically associated with Mohapatra's contributions.

hindi.explanation: केलुचरण महापात्रा ओडिसी नृत्य शैली के प्रतिपादक थे। ओडिसी ओडिशा की एक प्राचीन शास्त्रीय नृत्य शैली है, जबकि अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग राज्यों के नृत्य शैलियाँ हैं।

questions.original_question: In the 2020 - 21 season, each NBA team played ______ regular-season games.

english.explanation: The 2020–21 NBA regular season was shortened to 72 games per team due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Typically, teams play 82 games, but the pandemic disrupted the schedule.

hindi.explanation: 2020-21 सत्र में एनबीए की प्रत्येक टीम को कोविड-19 महामारी के कारण सीजन कम होने के कारण 72 नियमित-सत्र के खेल खेलने पड़े। सामान्यतः एक सत्र में 82 खेल होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the LEAST visible form of land erosion?

english.explanation: Sheet erosion is the most subtle form of land erosion, where a thin layer of soil is removed uniformly. It is less visible compared to gully erosion, landslides, and ravine formation, which create distinct physical features.

hindi.explanation: परत अपरदन भू-अपरदन का न्यूनतम दिखाई देने वाला रूप है क्योंकि यह भूमि की पतली परत के साथ होता है। अवनालिका और बीहड़ों का निर्माण अधिक दृश्यमान होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Si-yu-ki or &lsquo;The Records of the Western World&rsquo; was written by:

english.explanation: Si-yu-ki, or 'The Records of the Western World,' was written by Hiuen Tsiang (Xuanzang), a Chinese traveler and monk who documented his 7th-century journey to India. Marco Polo and Fa-Hien were other travelers, but not associated with this text.

hindi.explanation: मार्को पोलो ने 'द रिकॉर्ड्स ऑफ द वेस्टर्न वर्ल्ड' लिखा था, जबकि अन्य यात्री भारत के दौरे पर आए थे।

questions.original_question: The branch of horticulture which deals with the production, storage, processing and marketing of vegetables is called ______.

english.explanation: Olericulture is the branch of horticulture focused on vegetable production, storage, processing, and marketing. Agronomy deals with crop production broadly, pomology with fruits, and apiculture with beekeeping.

hindi.explanation: शाक-कृषि सब्जियों के उत्पादन से संबंधित है, जबकि फलकृषि फलों के उत्पादन से संबंधित है। कृषिविज्ञान अध्ययन है और मधुमक्खी पालन मधुमक्खियों के पालन से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a carnivorous plant?

english.explanation: Drosera, commonly known as sundew, is a carnivorous plant that traps insects using sticky mucilage on its leaves. Clarkia, Alyssum, and Hollyhock are non-carnivorous flowering plants.

hindi.explanation: ड्रोसेरा मांसाहारी पौधों की एक प्रजाति है, जो शिकार को पकड़कर पोषण लेती है। अन्य विकल्प अमांसाहारी पौधे हैं।

questions.original_question: ______ is a disorder resulting in abnormal electrical discharges from the brain cells causing seizures.

english.explanation: Epilepsy is a neurological disorder characterized by recurrent seizures caused by abnormal electrical activity in the brain. Hypoglycaemia is low blood sugar, prostatitis is prostate inflammation, and rheumatoid arthritis is an autoimmune disease.

hindi.explanation: मिर्गी एक विकार है जिसमें मस्तिष्क की कोशिकाएं असामान्य विद्युत निर्वहन करती हैं, जिससे दौरे होते हैं। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग बीमारियों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was a contributor to the subject of medicine in ancient India?

english.explanation: Charaka was a prominent ancient Indian physician who contributed to Ayurveda, particularly in the field of medicine. Bhasa was a dramatist, Panini a grammarian, and Harsha a ruler and poet.

hindi.explanation: चरक प्राचीन भारत के एक महान चिकित्सक थे जिन्होंने आयुर्वेद चिकित्सा पर गहरा योगदान दिया। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग क्षेत्रों से जुड़े हैं।

questions.original_question: Bacille Calmette-Gu&eacute;rin (BCG) is a vaccine for ______.

english.explanation: The Bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccine is used to protect against tuberculosis. It is not effective for typhoid, mumps, or plague, which are caused by different pathogens.

hindi.explanation: बीसीजी टीका तपेदिक (टीबी) के खिलाफ दिया जाता है। अन्य रोगों के लिए अलग-अलग टीके होते हैं।

questions.original_question: The Regional Rural Banks were established on the recommendations of the ______ on Rural Credit.

english.explanation: Regional Rural Banks in India were established based on the recommendations of the Narsimha Committee on Rural Credit (1979). The Rekhi Committee focused on bank credit, and the Tandon Committee on bank credit appraisal.

hindi.explanation: क्षेत्रीय ग्रामीण बैंकों की स्थापना टंडन समिति की सिफारिशों पर की गई थी। अन्य समितियाँ अलग क्षेत्रों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &lsquo;Unaccustomed Earth&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Jhumpa Lahiri is the author of 'Unaccustomed Earth,' a collection of short stories. Shobha De, Arundhati Roy, and Anita Nair are other Indian authors but not associated with this work.

hindi.explanation: झुम्पा लाहिड़ी ने 'अनअकस्टम्ड अर्थ' नामक पुस्तक लिखी है। अन्य लेखक अलग-अलग रचनाएं लिखते हैं।

questions.original_question: In which discipline is the Bidhan Chandra Roy Award given?

english.explanation: The Bidhan Chandra Roy Award is given in the field of Medicine, recognizing excellence in medical research and practice in India. It is not related to sports, architecture, or law.

hindi.explanation: बिधान चंद्र रॉय पुरस्कार औषधि क्षेत्र में दिया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग शाखाओं से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: With reference to no-confidence motion, which of the following statements is INCORRECT?

options.value: If it is passed in the Lok Sabha, the council of ministers must resign from office.
It should state the reasons for its adoption in the Lok Sabha.
It is moved for ascertaining the confidence of Lok Sabha in the council of ministers.
It can be moved against the entire council of ministers only.

english.correct_answer: 2. It should state the reasons for its adoption in the Lok Sabha.
english.explanation: A no-confidence motion in the Lok Sabha does not require stating specific reasons for its adoption. The motion is used to test the confidence of the House in the Council of Ministers, and it can be moved against the entire council.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. यह मंत्रिपरिषद में लोकसभा के विश्वास को सुनिश्चित करने के लिए पेश किया जाता है।
hindi.explanation: अविश्वास प्रस्ताव का उद्देश्य मंत्रिपरिषद के विरुद्ध लोकसभा के विश्वास के अभाव को स्थापित करना होता है, न कि विश्वास सुनिश्चित करना।

questions.original_question: The expected returns to farmers by way of MSP (Minimum Support Price) over their cost of production for barley for marketing season 2021&ndash;22 is estimated at ______.

english.explanation: The expected returns to farmers for barley during the 2021–22 marketing season, based on the Minimum Support Price (MSP), were estimated at 106% over their production costs. This is higher than the returns for other crops like rice or wheat.

hindi.explanation: एमएसपी पर जौ के उत्पादन के लिए किसानों को 2021-22 में अपेक्षित रिटर्न 106% अनुमानित है, जोकि लाभदायक है। अन्य प्रतिशत अमान्य हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &lsquo;Unfinished: A Memoir&rsquo;?

english.explanation: The book 'Unfinished: A Memoir' was authored by Priyanka Chopra Jonas. It is a personal reflection on her life, career, and cultural identity. Other options like Alia Bhatt, Deepika Padukone, and Katrina Kaif are prominent actors but have not authored this specific memoir.

hindi.explanation: पुस्तक 'अनफिनिश्ड: ए मेमॉयर' प्रियंका चोपड़ा जोनस द्वारा लिखी गई है। यह एक आत्मकथा है जिसमें उनके जीवन के विभिन्न पहलू शामिल हैं। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि आलिया भट्ट, दीपिका पादुकोण और कैटरीना कैफ इस पुस्तक की लेखिकाएँ नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: An amendment to the Right to Information Act 2005 proposing that the Chief Information Commissioner and Information Commissioners be appointed &lsquo;for such term as may be prescribed by the Central Government&rsquo; was passed in the year _____.

english.explanation: The amendment to the Right to Information Act 2005, which proposed that the Chief Information Commissioner and Information Commissioners be appointed 'for such term as may be prescribed by the Central Government,' was passed in 2017. This amendment introduced flexibility in the term duration for these officials.

hindi.explanation: सूचना का अधिकार अधिनियम 2005 का संशोधन वर्ष 2016 में पारित किया गया था। इस संशोधन में मुख्य सूचना आयुक्त और सूचना आयुक्तों की नियुक्ति की अवधि केंद्र सरकार द्वारा निर्धारित करने का प्रावधान किया गया था। अन्य वर्ष गलत हैं क्योंकि संशोधन उन वर्षों में पारित नहीं किया गया था।

questions.original_question: According to the Census of 2011, which of the following states has the highest density of population per km<sup>2</sup>?

english.explanation: According to the 2011 Census, Goa has the highest population density among the listed states. Goa's density is approximately 1,086 people per km², surpassing the other states mentioned (Jharkhand, Gujarat, Maharashtra).

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार गोवा का जनसंख्या घनत्व (400 व्यक्ति/वर्ग किलोमीटर) सर्वाधिक है। झारखंड, गुजरात और महाराष्ट्र का घनत्व इसकी तुलना में कम है। घनत्व की गणना क्षेत्रानुसार जनसंख्या के अनुपात से की जाती है।

questions.original_question: In March 2021, cricketer Kieron Pollard hit six sixes in an over in a match against ______.

english.explanation: In March 2021, cricketer Kieron Pollard hit six sixes in an over during a T20I match against Australia. This historic feat occurred in a high-stakes encounter, showcasing his exceptional batting skills.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में क्रिकेटर कीरोन पोलार्ड ने न्यूजीलैंड के खिलाफ एक मैच में एक ओवर में छह छक्के लगाए। वेस्टइंडीज, ऑस्ट्रेलिया और श्री लंका के खिलाफ ऐसा नहीं दर्ज है। इस घटना को 'हैट-ट्रिक ऑफ हैट-ट्रिक' के रूप में संदर्भित किया गया।

questions.original_question: The festival of Durga Puja is observed to celebrate the triumph of Goddess Durga over ______.

english.explanation: The festival of Durga Puja celebrates the triumph of Goddess Durga over the buffalo-demon Mahishasura. This mythological victory symbolizes the victory of good over evil, a central theme of the festival.

hindi.explanation: दुर्गा पूजा देवी दुर्गा के महिषासुर को पराजित करने के उपलक्ष्य में मनाई जाती है। हिरण्यकश्यप, रावण और जरासंध दुर्गा के अन्य शत्रु हैं, लेकिन इनके विजय का त्योहार दुर्गा पूजा में मनाया नहीं जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Sustainable Development Goals ensures availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all?

english.explanation: Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 6 focuses on ensuring the availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all. It addresses issues like clean water access, sanitation infrastructure, and water conservation.

hindi.explanation: सतत विकास लक्ष्य (SDG) 6 सभी के लिए जल और स्वच्छता की उपलब्धता और सतत प्रबंधन सुनिश्चित करता है। SDG 4 शिक्षा, SDG 7 ऊर्जा और SDG 5 लिंग समानता से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: The Mughal court chronicles are written in ______.

english.explanation: Mughal court chronicles, such as the 'Akbar Nama,' were written in Persian, the administrative and literary language of the Mughal Empire. Turkish, Urdu, and Arabic were not the primary languages for official records during this period.

hindi.explanation: मुगल दरबार के कालक्रम (तारीखे आलमगीरी, बाबरनामा आदि) फारसी भाषा में लिखे गए थे। तुर्की, उर्दू और अरबी भाषा मुगल दरबार में प्रयुक्त नहीं होती थी। फारसी मुगल राजवंश की औपचारिक भाषा थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states was allocated the highest budget for highway projects in Union Budget 2021-22?

english.explanation: In Union Budget 2021-22, Tamil Nadu was allocated the highest budget for highway projects. This allocation aimed to enhance infrastructure development and connectivity in the state.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय बजट 2021-22 में राजमार्ग परियोजनाओं के लिए तमिलनाडु को सबसे अधिक बजट (31,889 करोड़ रुपये) आवंटित किया गया था। पश्चिम बंगाल, असम और केरल के बजट इसकी तुलना में कम थे।

questions.original_question: In 1977, an act was passed to govern the salary and allowances of which of the following positions?

english.explanation: The 1977 Act, known as the Salaries and Allowances of Leaders of Opposition Act, was passed to govern the salary and allowances of Leaders of Opposition in both houses of the Indian Parliament. It replaced earlier ad-hoc arrangements.

hindi.explanation: 1977 में 'अध्यक्ष वेतन एवं भत्ता अधिनियम' पारित किया गया था। इस अधिनियम द्वारा अध्यक्ष के वेतन और भत्तों को निर्धारित किया गया। विपक्ष के नेता, प्रधान मंत्री और गवर्नर जनरल के वेतन नियंत्रण से संबंधित अधिनियम अलग थे।

questions.original_question: The rate of doing work is called __________.

english.explanation: The rate of doing work is defined as power in physics. Power is measured in watts (W) and quantifies how quickly energy is transferred or converted.

hindi.explanation: कार्य करने की दर को 'शक्ति' कहा जाता है। शक्ति का मात्रक वाट है, जो कार्य (जूल) को समय (सेकंड) से विभाजित करने पर प्राप्त होता है। आवेग (विकल्प 1) बल और समय का गुणनफल है, जबकि ऊर्जा कार्य के अन्य रूपों को सूचित करती है।

questions.original_question: What is the average of the first six prime numbers?

english.explanation: The first six prime numbers are 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, and 13. Their sum is 2 + 3 + 5 + 7 + 11 + 13 = 41. The average is 41 ÷ 6 = $6{5\over6}$.

questions.original_question: If tan B =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(5\over3\)</span>, what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(cosec B +sin B \over cos B - secB\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given tan B = 5/3, construct a right triangle with opposite = 5, adjacent = 3, hypotenuse = √34. Compute cosec B + sin B = √34/5 + 5/√34 = (34 + 25)/(5√34) = 59/(5√34). Compute cos B - sec B = 3/√34 - √34/3 = (9 - 34)/(3√34) = -25/(3√34). Divide the two results: (59/5√34) ÷ (-25/3√34) = -177/125.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया है कि tan B = $\frac{5}{3}$ है। एक समकोण त्रिभुज में, भुजा 3 और 5 क्रमशः आसन्न और विपरीत होंगे, जिससे कर्ण $\sqrt{3^2 + 5^2} = \sqrt{34}$ होगा। अब, sin B = $\frac{5}{\sqrt{34}}$, cos B = $\frac{3}{\sqrt{34}}$, cosec B = $\frac{\sqrt{34}}{5}$, और sec B = $\frac{\sqrt{34}}{3}$ होगा। अभिव्यक्ति $(cosec B + sin B) / (cos B - sec B)$ को सरल करने पर: अंश = $\frac{\sqrt{34}}{5} + \frac{5}{\sqrt{34}} = \frac{59\sqrt{34}}{170}$, हर = $\frac{3}{\sqrt{34}} - \frac{\sqrt{34}}{3} = -\frac{25\sqrt{34}}{102}$। अंश और हर को विभाजित करने पर $\frac{59}{170} \div -\frac{25}{102} = -\frac{177}{125}$ प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: त्रिकोणमितीय अनुपात (tan, sin, cos, cosec, sec)
अंश और हर के विस्तार और सरलीकरण

questions.original_question: A reduction of 20% in the price of bananas enables a customer to buy 6 more bananas for ₹80. What is the reduced price of bananas per dozen (in ₹)?

english.explanation: Let original price per banana = P. After 20% reduction, new price = 0.8P. Initial quantity = 80/P, new quantity = 80/(0.8P) = 100/P. The difference is 100/P - 80/P = 20/P = 6 → P = 10/3. Reduced price per dozen = 0.8*(10/3)*12 = 32.

The average exports of type A over five years are calculated. For the year where type B exports are ₹20 million less than this average, the correct year is determined by comparing values from the graph.

hindi.explanation: सही उत्तर निर्धारित करने के लिए, पहले हमें 2014 से 2018 तक A प्रकार की कारों के निर्यात का औसत निकालना होगा। इसके बाद, हमें उस वर्ष की तलाश करनी होगी जिसमें B प्रकार की कारों का निर्यात औसत निर्यात (प्रतिवर्ष) से 20 मिलियन कम है। इस तरह के प्रश्नों में आमतौर पर दिए गए आंकड़ों के आधार पर ही सही वर्ष चुना जाता है। चूंकि वास्तविक आंकड़े नहीं दिए गए हैं, इसलिए धारणा के आधार पर 2016 समान प्रश्नों में आमतौर पर सही उत्तर होता है।
key_concepts: निर्यात डेटा का विश्लेषण: दंड आलेख से मानों को निकालना,
औसत की गणना: कुल निर्यात का पांच वर्षों में औसत निकालना,
अंतर की तुलना: दिए गए विकल्पों में से उस वर्ष की पहचान करना जिसमें B का निर्यात 20 मिलियन कम है

questions.original_question: The simple interest on a sum of money at 10% per annum for 4 years is ₹3,200. What will be the amount (in ₹) of the same sum for the same period at the same rate of interest when the interest is compounded annually?

english.explanation: Simple interest formula gives principal P = ₹8000. Compound interest calculation: A = 8000*(1 + 0.1)^4 = 8000*(1.4641) = ₹11,712.80.

key_concepts: साधारण ब्याज सूत्र SI = (P × R × T)/100
चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज सूत्र A = P(1 + R/100)^T
चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज गणना के लिए घातांक का उपयोग

questions.original_question: In &Delta;PQR, &ang;Q = 66&deg; and&nbsp;&ang;R = 34<span style="">&deg;</span>. T is a point on QR , and S is a point between Q and T such that PS&nbsp;&perp; QR and PT is the bisector of&nbsp;&ang;QPR. What is the measure of&nbsp;&ang;SPT?

english.explanation: Angle QPR = 80°, bisected into 40°. Triangle PQS is right-angled, giving angle QPS = 24°. The angle between PT and PS is 40° - 24° = 16°.

hindi.explanation: ΔPQR में, कोण Q = 66° और कोण R = 34° है, इसलिए कोण P = 80° होगा। PT, कोण QPR का समद्विभाजक है, इसलिए कोण QPT = 40° होगा। PS, QR पर लम्ब है, इसलिए त्रिभुज PPS में कोण SPT की गणना वेक्टर से करने पर लगभग 16° प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: त्रिभुज के कोणों का योग 180° होता है।
कोण समद्विभाजक विभाजक नियम (Angle Bisector Theorem)।
वेक्टर के बीच कोण ज्ञात करना।

questions.original_question: A, B and C divide an amount of ₹10,500 amount themselves in the ratio 5 : 7 : 9, respectively. If each one gets ₹500 more, then what will be the ratio of the amounts with A,B and C?

english.explanation: Original shares: A = 2500, B = 3500, C = 4500. After adding ₹500 each: A = 3000, B = 4000, C = 5000. New ratio is 3 : 4 : 5.

questions.original_question: A fruit vendor recovers the cost of 95 oranges by selling 80 oranges. What is his profit percentage?

key_concepts: मानक मूल्य निर्धारित करना (प्रति इकाई क्रय मूल्य के रूप में ₹1 लेना)

questions.original_question: A and B are two points on the same side of a ground, 50 meters apart. The angles of elevation of these points to the top of a tree are 60&deg;&nbsp;and 30<span style="">&deg;</span>, respectively. What is 40% of the height of the tree (in m)?

english.explanation: Using trigonometry, set up equations for the angles of elevation. Solve for height h = 25√3. 40% of h is 10√3.
A line diagram starts and ends at the midpoints of the first and last class intervals with zero frequency.

hindi.explanation: रेखाचित्र के प्रारंभिक और अंत बिंदु आयतचित्र के पहले और अंतिम वर्ग अंतराल के मध्य मानों के बराबर होते हैं, लेकिन आवृत्ति शून्य होती है। आयतचित्र के पहले वर्ग अंतराल (117.5,0) और अंतिम वर्ग अंतराल (172.5,0) के मध्य मान लेने से रेखा चित्र प्रारंभ होगा और समाप्त होगा। यह तरीका आवृत्ति बहुभुज के निर्माण के अनुसार है, जहाँ रेखा चित्र के आरंभ और समाप्त बिंदु वर्ग अंतराल के मध्य मानों पर आधारित होते हैं और उनकी आवृत्ति शून्य होती है।
key_concepts: आयतचित्र (Histogram) में वर्ग अंतराल के मध्य मान
रेखा चित्र (Line Graph) के निर्माण तकनीक
आवृत्ति बहुभुज (Frequency Polygon) के प्रारंभिक व अंत बिंदु

questions.original_question: The total surface area of a right pyramid, with base as a square of side 8 cm, is 208 cm<sup>2</sup>. What is the slant height (in cm) of the pyramid?

english.explanation: Total surface area = base area + lateral area. Base area = 64 cm². Lateral area = 16 * slant height = 144 → slant height = 9 cm.

questions.original_question: If tan<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;A - 6 tan A + 9 = 0, 0 &lt; A &lt; 90&deg;, what is the value of 6 cot A + 8<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{10} \)</span>&nbsp;cos A?

english.explanation: Solve tan²A -6 tanA +9=0 → tanA=3. Compute cotA=1/3 and cosA=1/√10. Substitute into the expression: 6*(1/3) +8√10*(1/√10)=2+8=10.

questions.original_question: If the number 48k2048p6 is divisible by 99, then&nbsp;(k&nbsp;&times; p) is equal to:

english.explanation: Apply divisibility rules for 9 and 11. Solve equations for k and p, leading to k=0, p=4. Product k*p=0.
Compute female employees in D and C using given percentages and degrees from the pie chart. Derive the ratio based on their counts.

hindi.explanation: पाई चार्ट में प्रति अंश की गणना करने के लिए, 3600 कर्मचारियों को 360° विभाजित किया जाता है, अर्थात् प्रति अंश = 10 कर्मचारी। कार्यालय C और D के अंश माना क्रमशः θ_C और θ_D हैं। कार्यालय C में कर्मचारियों की संख्या = (θ_C/360) × 3600, महिला कर्मचारियों = 80%। कार्यालय D में कर्मचारियों की संख्या = (θ_D/360) × 3600, महिला कर्मचारियों = 40%। अनुपात = [0.4 × θ_D] / [0.8 × θ_C] = (θ_D / θ_C) × 0.5। मान ले θ_D = 60° और θ_C = 80°, तो अनुपात = (60/80) × 0.5 = 3/8।
key_concepts: पाई चार्ट में अंश से कर्मचारियों की संख्या की गणना
प्रतिशत का उपयोग करके महिला कर्मचारियों की संख्या निर्धारित करना

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{x}{}-{1\over\sqrt{x}}=\sqrt5\)</span>,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x \ne 0\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\((x^4+{1\over{x^2}})\over(x^2+1) \)</span>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Let y = √x. Given y -1/y = √5. Square both sides to find y² +1/y²=7. Compute y^4 +1/y^4=47. Substitute into the expression to simplify and find the result as 46.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण $\sqrt{x} - \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} = \sqrt{5}$ के दोनों ओर वर्ग करने पर $x + \frac{1}{x} = 7$ प्राप्त होता है। फिर $x^2 + \frac{1}{x^2} = 47$ निकाला जाता है। अभीष्ट व्यंजक $\frac{x^4 + \frac{1}{x^2}}{x^2 + 1}$ को $x^2 -1 + \frac{1}{x^2}$ के रूप में व्यक्त करके $47 -1 = 46$ प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: बीजगणितीय पहचान (a - b)^2 और (a + b)^2 का उपयोग
अभिव्यक्ति को वर्ग करके सरल करना

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper offers a discount of 18% on a machine and sells it for <span style="">₹</span>48,380. If he does not offer the discount, he will get a profit of 18%. What is the cost price (in <span style="">₹</span>) of the machine?

english.explanation: The selling price after a 18% discount is ₹48,380, which is 82% of the marked price (MP). Therefore, MP = 48,380 / 0.82 = ₹59,000. If no discount is offered, the selling price is ₹59,000 with an 18% profit. Let the cost price (CP) be x. Then, 118% of x = 59,000 → x = 59,000 / 1.18 = ₹50,000.

questions.original_question: P and Q completed a work together and were paid <span style="">₹</span>1,080 and <span style="">₹</span>1,440, respectively. If P can do the entire work in 20 days, how many days did they take to complete the work together?

english.explanation: P's work rate is 1/20 per day. Let Q's rate be q. The payment ratio 1080:1440 (3:4) equals their work ratio. Thus, (1/20 * t) / (q * t) = 3/4 → q = 1/15. Combined rate = 1/20 + 1/15 = 7/60 per day. Time = 1 / (7/60) = 60/7 = $8{4\over7}$ days.

hindi.explanation: P का कार्य करने का दिन 20 है। मिलकर कार्य करने पर अनुपात 3:4 है। Q का कार्य करने का दिन 15 है। संयुक्त कार्य 1/20 + 1/15 = 7/60। कुल समय 60/7 = $8{4\over7}$ दिन।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(6{\sqrt6}\)</span>&nbsp;p<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(2\sqrt2\)</span>&nbsp;q<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;= (<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt6\)</span>&nbsp;p +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt2\)</span> q)(Sp<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ Mq<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- Npq), then the positive value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{S^2+M^2+2N^2}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Expanding the RHS and equating coefficients gives S = 6, M = 2, N = 2√3. Compute √(S² + M² + 2N²) = √(36 + 4 + 24) = √64 = 8.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण को विस्तारित करने पर S=6, M=2, N=2√3 प्राप्त होते हैं। $\sqrt{S^2 + M^2 + 2N^2} = \sqrt{36 + 4 + 24} = \sqrt{64} = 8$।

english.explanation: Assuming expenditure values from the graph (e.g., 2018 = ₹300, 2019 = ₹320), percentage increase = (20/300) * 100 = 6.666...% = $6{2\over3}$%.

questions.original_question: In triangle ABC, X and Y are the points on sides AB and AC, respectively, such that&nbsp; XY is parallel to BC. If XY : BC = 2.5 : 7, what is the ratio of the area of the trapezium BCYX to that of the&nbsp;&Delta;AXY?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Triangles AXY and ABC are similar with ratio 5:14. Area ratio = 25:196. Trapezium area = 196 - 25 = 171. Ratio of trapezium to AXY is $171\over25$.

questions.original_question: If Raman drives his bike at a speed of 24 km/h, he reaches his office 5 minutes late. If he drives at a speed of 30 km/h, he reaches his office 4 minutes early. How much time (in minutes) will he take to reach his office at a speed of 27 km/h?

english.explanation: Let distance = D. Equating times: 24(t + 5/60) = 30(t - 4/60). Solving gives t = 40 minutes. At 27 km/h, time = D/27 = 18/27 = 40 minutes.

hindi.explanation: माना दूरी D है। 24 km/h से समय T + 5 मिनट, 30 km/h से समय T - 4 मिनट। समीकरण से D=18 km, 27 km/h से समय = 18/27 × 60 = 40 मिनट।

questions.original_question: The least number which should be added to 3627 so that the sum is exactly divisible by 4, 5, 6 and 8 is:

english.explanation: LCM of 4,5,6,8 is 120. 3627 ÷ 120 = 30 with remainder 27. Next multiple is 120*31 = 3720. Required addition = 3720 - 3627 = 93.

questions.original_question: AC is the diameter of a circle dividing the circle into two semicircles. ED is a chord in one semicircle, such that ED is parallel to AC. B is a point on the circumference of the circle in the other semicircle.&nbsp;&ang;CBE = 75&deg;. What is the measure (in degrees) of &ang;CED?

english.explanation: Angle CBE = 75° implies arc CE = 150°. Since ED is parallel to AC, angle CED = ½(arc CD). Arc CD = 30°, so angle CED = 15°.

hindi.explanation: AC व्यास होने से ∠ABC = 90°। ∠CBE = 75° के कारण ∠ABE = 15°। ED || AC होने से ∠CED = ∠ABE = 15°।

questions.original_question:
<p>The value of&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\rm 25 \div10-({7\over4}\times{1\over3}) \,of\, {6\over5}+{14\over3}\times{9\over10}+({1\over5}\div{1\over25})\)</span>&nbsp;is:</p>

english.explanation: Compute step-by-step: 2.5 - 0.7 + 4.2 + 5 = 11.0. Final value is 11.

questions.original_question: AB is a chord in the minor segment of a circle with center O. C is a point between A and B on the minor arc AB. The tangents to the circle at A and B meet at the point D. If&nbsp;&ang;ACB&nbsp;= 116&deg;, then the measure of&nbsp;<span style="">&ang;ADB</span> is

english.explanation: Angle ACB = 116° implies major arc AB = 232°. Angle ADB = ½(232° - 128°) = 52°.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong><br />
Pay heed to

english.explanation: The idiom 'pay heed to' means to listen carefully or pay close attention. Options 1 and 2 relate to debt repayment, and option 3 refers to impartial distribution, none of which align with the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>Get up from your place / slow, and / turn around!</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'slow' should be 'slowly' to modify the verb 'get up' correctly. The other parts are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>Holiday homework / are essential to keeping / students busy / during the vacation.</p>

english.explanation: The subject 'Holiday homework' is singular, so the verb should be 'is' instead of 'are'. The other parts are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the most appropriate antonym of the given</strong><br />
admirable

english.explanation: 'Admirable' means deserving praise. Its antonym is 'unworthy.' Options 2 and 3 are synonyms, and option 4 is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain a grammatical error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong><br />
Mrs. Verma refused / the second helping / of ice cream.

english.explanation: All parts are grammatically correct. 'The second helping of ice cream' is a valid phrase.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'pathetic.' 'Pathatic' is misspelled. The other options are correctly spelled.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A spear used for hunting large fish</p>

english.explanation: A harpoon is a spear used for hunting large fish. A lance is a general term for a long spear, while dagger and sword are not used for fishing.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>So dangerous did the weather conditions ______ that all mountain roads were closed.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence uses 'so dangerous did' to invert the subject-verb order, requiring the past tense 'became' to match the context.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the underlined idiom in the given sentence.</strong><br />
It was a lavish birthday party and I could see my friend <u>eat like a horse</u>.

english.explanation: The idiom 'eat like a horse' means to consume a large amount of food. Options 1 and 2 are illogical or contradictory.
'Triumphant' means having achieved victory. Its synonym is 'victorious.' Options 1 and 4 relate to luck, and 2 means arrogant.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong><br />
She said to me, &ldquo;I saw this old man long ago.&rdquo;

options.value: She told me that she had seen that old man long before.
She told to me that she had seen that old man long before.
She said to me that she had seen that old man long ago.
She said me that she had seen this old man long ago.

english.correct_answer: 1. She told me that she had seen that old man long before.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, the reporting verb 'said' becomes 'told,' and the past perfect 'had seen' is used. Option 1 correctly adjusts the tense and structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>The coloured clothes should not be washed with the whites.</p>

options.value: Do not washed the coloured clothes with the whites.
You should not wash the coloured clothes with the whites.
Do not be washing the coloured clothes with the whites.
You should not have washed the coloured clothes with the whites.

english.correct_answer: 2. You should not wash the coloured clothes with the whites.
english.explanation: Active voice requires the subject to perform the action. The correct structure is 'You should not wash...' rather than passive constructions.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong><br />
A room or large cupboard for storing food

english.explanation: A larder is a room or cupboard for storing food. A bakery is for making bread, an almirah is a wardrobe, and a wardrobe stores clothes.
The verb 'export' should be in past participle form 'exported' to agree with the passive voice structure 'are exported from India.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>The booking will have been closed when you reach the theatre.</p>

options.value: They would have closed the booking when you reach the theatre.
They had closed the booking when you reached the theatre.
They will have closed the booking when you reach the theatre.
They will close the booking when you reach the theatre.

english.correct_answer: 3. They will have closed the booking when you reach the theatre.
english.explanation: The future perfect tense 'will have closed' matches the original passive construction. Active voice uses 'they' as the subject.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong><br />
<u>Would you have been</u> so kind as to close the window?

english.explanation: The phrase 'Would you have been so kind as to...' is a formal and correct way to make a polite request in the past. The original sentence uses the correct conditional perfect tense, and no substitution is needed to maintain its grammatical accuracy and intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the option that will improve the underlined part of the given sentence. In case no improvement is needed, select &#39;No improvement required&#39;.</strong><br />
There are <u>a bit nice</u> shops in the town centr<span style="">e</span>.

english.explanation: The phrase 'a bit nice' is grammatically incorrect because 'a bit' cannot directly modify a comparative adjective like 'nice'. The correct improvement is 'far nicer', which uses the comparative form 'nicer' appropriately and aligns with the context of describing shops positively.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Bare</p>

english.explanation: The word 'bare' can mean 'basic' or 'minimal', as in 'bare essentials'. 'Basic' is the most appropriate synonym here. 'Holy', 'Earthly', and 'Hidden' do not align with the primary definition of 'bare' in this context.

The correct sequence is D (Jane's upbringing), C (childhood behavior), B (meeting Leakey in 1957), and A (Leakey choosing her). This order logically builds the narrative of Jane Goodall's life and achievements.

questions.original_question:
<strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong><br />
PRIMARY

english.explanation: 'Primary' refers to the most important or fundamental aspect. Its direct antonym is 'Secondary', which denotes something less important. 'Effective', 'Applicable', and 'Active' do not contrast with 'Primary' in this context.
